decisions.description: What team was selected to route to.
decisions.name: Team
decisions.label: Team

Flow.description:
Re-Route case with updated details or cross-functional teams.
- Removed references to Prior_Agent__c - Removed Query for Engagement Queue & record type instead used setting, marked is case manual create to false - Added Specialization Screens - Added Prior agent to be null - Routing team updated for only vendor - Routing Team if not populated - Added Decision to skip Cases of Origin/Channel as Phone/Chat - Added Routing Team override - Added Re-Route Count to track how many times a Case is routed using this component - Making Routing Case Reason as Empty if it is 'Route to Spanish' - Moved picklist selections from multiple screens to one screen - Added Specialization Spanish and related Routing Case reason - Trigger Validation error if Specialization TAM is selected - Changed Visibility condition for Team field from field Vendor to Custom Permission Re-Route Team Option - Apex Action to check if the Skills selected are different from the Case Routed Skills - BTE-4146: Prevent Internal Care Re-Route v2

fields.name: Copy_1_of_RouteFailed
fields.fieldText:
Oops, Something went Wrong


This case origin is not eligible for re-routing through Omni-channel. The origin must be updated to "Email", or this case must be closed and a new Email case must be created. Please check with your PE if you do not have the necessary permissions to perform this action.

fields.name: SkillsMatchedError
fields.fieldText: Cases cannot be re-routed within a pillar. Please update the skills, or reach out to your PE if you cannot solve this case.﻿

fields.name: Engagement_Yes_No
fields.fieldText: Do you want to route this case to Engagement?

fields.name: Are_you_routing_this_case_to_a_specialization_team
fields.fieldText: Are you routing this case to a specialization team?

fields.name: Internal_ReRoute_Error
fields.fieldText: This case has already been re-routed within a Care. Please reach out to your PE for assistance.

fields.name: Specialization_Error
fields.fieldText: You do not have permission to re-route cases to the TAM team.﻿

fields.name: Internal_ReRoute_Error2
fields.fieldText: This case has already been re-routed within a Care

fields.name: CaseTypeHelpText
fields.fieldText: ﻿You can reference our Payroll and Benefits Case Reason resource for guidance on which "Case Type" and "Support Level" to select based on the customer's inquiry and case reason. To determine the case reason, refer to the "Use for" and "Do not use for" columns.

fields.name: RouteFailed
fields.fieldText:
Oops, Something went Wrong


It looks like something went wrong on our end. If this issue persistes, please sent a message to #biztech-help channel so we can help out.

fields.name: RoutedSuccessfully
fields.fieldText:
Hooray!!


Your case has been successfully routed.
